# CNContainerTypeKey

**Global Variable**

The type of the container.

## Declaration

```swift
let CNContainerTypeKey: String
```

## Discussion

This key represents the container identifier property for KVC/KVO usage. This property is always fetched.

## Groups and Containers

- **CNGroupNameKey**: The name of the group.
- **CNGroupIdentifierKey**: The identifier of the group.
- **CNContainerNameKey**: The name of the container.
title: CNContainerTypeKey
